Name: Infotel Dashboard

Name: CLOUDPOT Training site
Description: I've crafted an immersive training site using cutting-edge technologies. The site's dynamic menu is powered by a JSON data structure, allowing for seamless updates and modifications. Leverage interactive elements to engage users and provide a delightful culinary experience.

Name: SAIGON TOWN
Description: SAIGON TOWN is a captivating online platform developed by THANG LOI GROUP, offering visitors an immersive journey through the vibrant culture and lifestyle of Saigon. Seamlessly blending modern design with intuitive functionality, this website serves as a digital gateway to explore the dynamic cityscape of Saigon.

Name: Restaurant
Description: The Restaurant Project is a fully responsive website for a restaurant. It features an elegant design and a user-friendly interface, and it is optimized for mobile devices. It provides customers with an accessible and enjoyable way to explore the restaurant's offerings.
Tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS Animation, Responsive

Name: SAMAR
Description: The SAMAR Project is known for its user-friendly and visually appealing design. It incorporates smooth animations that enhance the overall user experience. While the project's specific purpose is not detailed, its design and interactivity contribute to an engaging user experience.
Tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS Animation

Name: The Diamond City
Description: Design, Develop User Interface, Implement Api, fully responsive, CRUD, Admin Page
